doc:
Ruth Draper https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ruth_Draper 0 Ruth Draper (December 2, 1884 – December 30, 1956) was an American actress, dramatist and noted diseuse who specialized in character-driven monologues and monodrama. Her best-known pieces include The Italian Lesson, Three Women and Mr. Clifford, Doctors and Diets, and A Church in Italy. Ruth_Draper ( December_2_,_1884 – December_30 , 1956 ) was an_American_actress , dramatist and noted diseuse who specialized in character-driven_monologues_and_monodrama . Her_best-known_pieces include The_Italian_Lesson , Three_Women and Mr._Clifford , Doctors_and_Diets , and A_Church in Italy .
